info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 1:18AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Vernon Parish through 145 AM CDT... At 118 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Anacoco to near Rosepine to near De Ridder. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leesville, Rosepine, Anacoco, Fort Polk, Slagle, New Llano, Hornbeck, Kurthwood, Hutton, Simpson and Pickering. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southwestern and west central Louisiana.
